# AVMutableVideoCompositionInstruction

**Class**

A mutable video composition instruction subclass.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVMutableVideoCompositionInstruction
```

## Overview

An [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVVideoComposition] object maintains an array of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVVideoComposition/instructions] to perform its composition.

## Configuring the instructions

- **backgroundColor**: The background color of the composition.
- **layerInstructions**: Instructions that specify how to layer and compose video frames from source tracks.
- **timeRange**: The time range to which the instruction applies.
- **enablePostProcessing**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the instruction requires post processing.

## Configuring source tracks

- **requiredSourceSampleDataTrackIDs**: The track identifiers of source sample data that the compositor requires to compose frames for the instruction.

## Built-in video compositing

- **Editing and playing HDR video**: Support high-dynamic-range (HDR) video content in your app by using the HDR editing and playback capabilities of AVFoundation.
- **Debugging AVFoundation audio mixes, compositions, and video compositions**: Resolve common problems when creating compositions, video compositions, and audio mixes.
- **AVVideoComposition**: An object that describes how to compose video frames at particular points in time.
- **AVVideoCompositionInstruction**: An operation that a compositor performs.
- **AVVideoCompositionLayerInstruction**: An object used to modify the transform, cropping, and opacity ramps applied to a given track in a composition.
- **AVMutableVideoComposition**: A mutable video composition subclass.
- **AVMutableVideoCompositionLayerInstruction**: An object used to modify the transform, cropping, and opacity ramps applied to a given track in a mutable composition.
